short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Connects your Basecamp project to a Kippt list for easy links sharing

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Connects your Basecamp project to a Kippt list for easy links sharing within Basecamp projects.
After installation, you can link a Kippt list to a certain Basecamp project, you can also view and share links within the project page.

Refresh your browser after installation. Kippt Login is required.
